name: Whop
description:
I don't exactly have much down yet, just a bit of juice and some basic mechanics, like interacting, shooting, and natural enemy spawning. Have fun interacting with the 2 NPCs and shooting down my one enemy. I'm mostly publishing this right now for feedback and to create a following for the game. Thank you for reading.

Features:

- Interact with other beings by colliding with them and pressing 'e'

- A starting gun

- Shoot monsters
